channel.title: Add second language to layout
channel.description: I’m adding a second language to layout, but it disappears after restarting qube - only one language (English) remains in layout. I tried it in both AppVM and TemplateVM/dvm (Kicksecure/Whonix), but second language always disappear. Is this a bug, or a private-function that only English to be used? Or am I doing something wrong? (First time using LXQt)

item.title: Add second language to layout
item.dc:creator: marmarek
item.description:
Are you talking about keyboard layout? Those are normally managed at dom0 level (when set in dom0, the setting is automatically propagated to relevant qubes).
